column5: does anyone know what the duty would be on a bottle of booze and an extra carton of smokes. Is it still better to pay the duty or buy it in Canada. thanks for any info.
Bring your own smokes and buy the Canadian booze. Its better than the US stuff and a lot stronger. The dollars figure is close to the same. Canadians like Americans who support the local economy.
duty is based on a percentage of what you paid for the stuff. bring a receipt. the duty is nominal but the delay is not usually worth it.
